attributes.additional_details: Lions - whilst resilient - are not British and do not truly represent the country. Pigeons are a staple of our culture and are widely associated with the UK.
attributes.background: Lions are the current national animal. The only lions in the UK are locked up in zoos and definitely not roaming free. Pigeons are free.

rejection.details: This isn’t something that the UK Government or Parliament would be able to do. The lion's status as the UK's national animal is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.
